name: HeXen Horror Game
description:
This game is one of my first Unity games from 2012. Maybe made in a week. I only updated the readme.

Gameplay:
It has 3 difficulty levels. The whole game is simple and short:
Find an item in the dark, avoid enemies, go to the lit up exit.
The only exception is the last level.
The game can be completed in 10-20 minutes.

More information is in the readme file.

Source:

Some game elements are used from other games like:
- Sound effects and some textures from HeXen
- Footsteps from Counter-Strike/Half-Life

Thanks to:
Sleepy93 and TomI1997 for testing.

Minimum system requirements:
- Windows XP SP2 or newer
- .Net Framework 2.0
- 512 MB RAM
- 2.0 Ghz CPU
- Nvidia 9500 GT
- 100 MB free space
- 40 MB after install
